snippet.title: A: Bash: only last iteration of loop index not being stored as new element of array
snippet.description: Dylan, Your homework give me an idea to do something with my music library too, and I see than you trying do your homework alone, so here is some comments - how to make an musicsort command … -line argument handling need set some defaults, if here are no arguments need find music files in your music directory need sort them by criteria need print them - in sorted order Skipping 1,2 for now …
